page.title: 15BY BUS TO SCHOOL AT WELLS
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 and after getting washed and dressed I go out of the front door and walk to the bus stop. The bus arrives at the stop at about 8.25. The older children sit nearer the back of the bus as this is thought of as a privilege. We arrive at our school at about 8.45 and the bell goes, signalling us to enter the school, at 8.50. After morning registration we go to lessons. Registration is to find which children are in school, so that they can be accounted for in case of a fire or other disaster. At school we have eight 40 or 35 minute lessons every day. There is a break in the morning of 15 minutes and a 1 hour 5 minute break for dinner.
